docs.description: Framed by tall concrete columns and suspended above the Vancouver Art Gallery’s lobby, our bistro and patio showcase culinary creativity using wholesome ingredients. Join us for an unforgettable experience and our seasonal dinner menu with local flavours.
docs.title: 1931 Gallery Bistro

docs.description:
Welcome to 75 West, where comfort and elegance create a distinctly West Coast experience in downtown Richmond. Just off the lobby of the newly redesigned Vancouver Airport Marriott, guests will experience the laidback warmth of B.C.’s West Coast through attentive, inviting service as well as our signature décor of earthy woods and marbles.

Our culinary team has created a contemporary menu featuring the best the Northwest has to offer through handcrafted share plates, classic mains and casual favourites.

Guests are invited to enhance their dining experience with our inventive cocktails, an impressive wine selection and a top-notch tap list of local craft beers designed to complement our cooking.

We’re proud to offer the same quality cuisine and service you’ve come to expect in a freshly redesigned space.
docs.title: 75 West Coast Grill

docs.description:
Modern Taiwanese Cuisine

A contemporary Taiwanese dining ideal delivered exquisitely to you.
docs.title: A. Bento

docs.description: The Acorn is an award-winning, vegetable-forward restaurant and bar located at the heart of Vancouver’s Main St. It is a destination for diners seeking the best and most creative meals made from fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Carefully crafted dishes cater to vegans and gluten free diners while ensuring that even the staunchest meat eaters leave fully satisfied.
docs.title: The Acorn

docs.description:
The Acqua Restaurant, Patio and Bar is now opened!


Located on the ground floor of Executive Suites Hotel and Conference Centre Metro Vancouver, the Patio is the ideal setting with stunning city skyline, a cozy corner or poolside views for a west coast cuisine dining experience, culinary delights in the neighborhood of The Amazing Brentwood.

Enjoy a whole new menu for an eccentric outdoor dining experience walkable distance from the business districts of Brentwood. Welcome to Acqua a sociable, relaxed space with a sense of elegance that inspires and captivates everyone.

Join us and enjoy Happy Hours and Dinner time with new tastes, friendly atmosphere, great service, and generous portions.
docs.title: Acqua Restaurant & Bar

docs.description:
Acquafarina is a Michelin Guide recommended fine-dining restaurant in downtown Vancouver. This is Italian dining at its finest, served with old world elegance and modern flair. Take a seat at the copper bar and enjoy inventive cocktails or settle in to our captivating dining room with its soaring ceilings and 5,000 bottle wine cellar. Private bookings for larger groups are available by request, and can be hosted in our intimate upstairs dining room with private bar or on our all season covered heated patio with retractable roof, making it ideal for winter gatherings and perfect for summer soirées.

Please be reminded that we request a business casual dress code. Baseball caps, torn denim, running shoes and flip-flops are discouraged.


Dinner Reservation
Open Tuesday to Saturday, we offer an extensive à la carte menu alongside our monthly changing seven-course tasting menu. To view the menus, please visit our website.

Lunch
Acquafarina offers lunch on Thursdays and Fridays, from 11:30 am to 3 pm. The lunch menu includes our signature pizza, blistered to perfection in our rotating-stone Malagutti ovens.

**Please note: all parties of 6 or more require a deposit of $25 per guests.

We look forward to welcoming you.
Thank you,
Acquafarina
docs.title: Acquafarina

docs.description:
Addah is an elegant casual dining restaurant with keen attention to detail, warm hospitality, and the goal of creating happy memories for our guests. Our passion is your delight, we truly care about what we do. We put the emphasis on natural and sustainable foods.

THE MENU OF ADDAH IS INFLUENCED BY THE HIMALAYAN CULTURE AS WELL AS THE BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE AND PRODUCE OF VANCOUVER.
docs.title: Addah

docs.description:
We are the first Afghan restaurant in Canada, serving Vancouver and the surrounding Lower Mainland for over 40 years.

We are pleased to bring you the finest authentic Afghani food in British Columbia, Canada. Our family-managed restaurant has been serving gourmet Afghan cuisine made from the freshest ingredients since 1974. Our award winning restaurant offers delectable Afghani dishes for meat lovers and vegetarians alike.

Come join us and explore the rich cultural wealth of The Afghan Horsemen Restaurant with delicious recipes that will take you through a culinary journey of mouth-watering Afghan dishes and will leave your palate craving for more!
docs.title: Afghan Horsemen Restaurant

docs.description: Afghan Kitchen is the manifestation of a young boy’s dream. He roamed the streets of Kabul in his sandals and saw how hard his family worked to sustain themselves. In the times of war, they moved to different neighbouring countries until they finally came to Canada. Every corner of Afghan Kitchen is thoughtfully curated. Every dish uses mum’s recipe. Afghan Kitchen is the taste of home.
docs.title: Afghan Kitchen - South Surrey

docs.description:
We’re named after a mountain—Mt. AFURI, on the east edge of the Tanzawa mountains in Kanagawa prefecture. Legend has it Mt. Afuri is the father of Mt. Fuji. 

Afuri has long been known for its waters, and in days past, it was considered a sacred mountain of good harvest, and thousands would journey to Mt. Afuri every year in pilgrimage. We like to think we’re bringing sacred Mt. Afuri to the rest of the world. The mountain provides us with a kind of philosophy. It can be a little tricky to translate it literally from Japanese, but let’s just call it “Higher.” We push higher in everything we do—everything, from pickling to serving—and we intend to reach for excellence as long as we are AFURI. Mt. Afuri remains—straight, honest, steadfast, dependable. That’s our aim. One ramen. One staff. Always higher.
docs.title: Afuri Ramen & Dumpling Richmond

docs.description:
Our menu centers around our signature bowl of Yuzu Shio ramen; a light, delicate broth built upon a reduction made from local chicken, dry fish"niboshi" "katsuobushi", dry konbu seaweed, and vegetables to produce a layer of umami flavors, and hints of refreshing yuzu citrus.
Our kitchen uses the same techniques employed in our central kitchen at the foot of AFURI mountain.
docs.title: Afuri Ramen Vancouver

docs.description: Agra Tandoori restaurant is recognized as both stylish and contemporary and brings a sense of elegance and sophistication to the Indian restaurant scene in Lower Mainland Vancouver. The menu has been prepared by our kitchen team in an innovative and contemporary style of Indian cooking, stunning presentations with which to tempt you.
docs.title: Agra Tandoori

docs.description: Agra Tandoori restaurant is recognized as both stylish and contemporary and brings a sense of elegance and sophistication to the Indian restaurant scene in Lower Mainland Vancouver. The menu has been prepared by our kitchen team in an innovative and contemporary style of Indian cooking, stunning presentations with which to tempt you.
docs.title: Agra Tandoori - Burnaby

docs.description:
Ajishou means ‘craftsman of taste’ in Japanese and
symbolizes our approach to serving the best local and
imported fish and seafood to meet the highest standards
of quality, freshness and seasonality, while combining
both modern-creative and traditional Japanese cooking
for a West Coast palette.
docs.title: Ajishou Brentwood Japanese Restaurant

docs.description:
Quaint Italian atmosphere. Steps away from the steamclock in Gastown.

An impressive two level dining area. Specializing in traditional Italian cuisine, seafood, game and wood-fire pizza. Critically acclaimed wine list, featuring over 300 world wines. A warm, romantic restaurant perfect for all occasions.
docs.title: Al Porto Ristorante

docs.description: Alimentaria shares the story of Mexican cuisine, culture and traditions through a licensed dine-in cantina and take-out window, dedicated corn production facility, educational space and mercado that all offer high-quality, locally and internationally sourced artisanal products and provisions — in essence, all the necessary elements visitors need to showcase an authentic Mexican taste of place on their own tables at home.
docs.title: Alimentaria Mexicana
